aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.introduction: Hello, I am a German-speaking frontend developer based near Munich. With a strong interest in IT and all its facets, I specialize in creating websites and web-based applications.
aboutMe.flexible: Working from home or on site at the company is no problem, I am open to both working models, including hybrid solutions.
aboutMe.open-minded: I love working with new technologies and constantly developing myself, technologically as well as interpersonally.
aboutMe.knowledge: As a software developer, I don't see technical systems as problems, but as an exciting task to make these systems work. With sound expertise and good communication within the team, I solve complex problems and help to turn your vision into reality.

mySkills.title: My skills
mySkills.part1: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
mySkills.part3: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

portfolio.introduction: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
project-descriptions: This app is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
Pollys Adventure is a web-based jump and run game.

feedback.author: C.Hampel - Team Partner
feedback.feedback: The collaboration in our team project with Kaloyan Ivanov worked very well at all times. Thanks to his in-depth knowledge of web development, he was a key factor in the success of our software project. Above all, I would like to emphasize his willingness to help with questions and problems of other team members.

feedback.author: Leila - Team Partner
feedback.feedback: I was very pleased to work with Kaloyan. Punctuality and creativity are his strengths! In addition, his communication skills and ability to explain his ideas are very appreciated, would work with you again and again Kaloyan.

contact.title: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

privacy.policyTextContinuation: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.name: Kaloyan Ivanov

eu_dispute_resolution.title: EU Dispute Resolution
eu_dispute_resolution.description: In accordance with the regulation on online dispute resolution in consumer affairs (ODR Regulation), we would like to inform you about the online dispute resolution platform (OS platform).
eu_dispute_resolution.notice: However, we would like to inform you that we are neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

liability_content.title: Liability for Content on this Website
liability_content.description: We constantly develop the content of this website and strive to provide correct and up-to-date information. Unfortunately, we cannot assume any liability for the correctness of all content on this website, especially for those provided by third parties.
liability_content.notice: Our obligations to remove information or block the use of information according to general laws due to judicial or official orders remain unaffected.

liability_links.title: Liability for Links on this Website
liability_links.description: Our website contains links to other websites for whose content we are not responsible.
liability_links.notice: If you notice any illegal links on our website, we kindly ask you to contact us. You can find the contact details in the imprint.

copyright.title: Copyright Notice
copyright.description: All content of this website (images, photos, texts, videos) is subject to copyright.
copyright.notice: Please ask us before you distribute, duplicate or exploit the content of this website.

imprint.copyright_text: All texts are protected by copyright.
imprint.source: Source: Created with the Imprint Generator Germany from AdSimple

generalNotes.title: General Information
generalNotes.content: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. Detailed information on the topic of data protection can be found in our privacy policy below this text.

responsibleEntity.title: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
responsibleEntity.content: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the section 'Note on the Responsible Entity' in this privacy policy.

dataCollectionMethods.title: How do we collect your data?
dataCollectionMethods.content: Your data is collected in part by you providing it to us. This can include data that you enter into a contact form. Other data is collected automatically or with your consent when you visit the website, such as technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of page view). This data is collected automatically as soon as you enter the website.

dataUsage.title: What do we use your data for?
dataUsage.content: Some of the data is collected to ensure the website functions correctly. Other data may be used to analyze your user behavior.

dataRights.title: What rights do you have regarding your data?
dataRights.content: You have the right to obtain information free of charge about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data at any time. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent for data processing, you can withdraw this consent at any time for the future. Additionally, you have the right to request the restriction of processing your personal data under certain circumstances. Furthermore, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.

provider.title: We host the content of our website with the following provider:
provider.name: Strato
provider.details: The provider is Strato AG, Otto-Ostrowski-Straße 7, 10249 Berlin (hereinafter 'Strato'). When you visit our website, Strato collects various log files including your IP addresses. Further information can be found in Strato's privacy policy at: https://www.strato.de/datenschutz/

processingAgreement.title: Order Processing
processingAgreement.content: We have entered into an order processing agreement (AVV) for the use of the above-mentioned service. This is a legally required contract that ensures that the provider processes personal data of our website visitors only according to our instructions and in compliance with the GDPR.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We handle your personal data confidentially and according to the legal data protection regulations and this privacy policy.

responsibleEntity.title: Note on the Responsible Entity
responsibleEntity.content: The responsible entity for data processing on this website is: Kaloyan Ivanov, Hindenburgstraße 7, 82467 Garmisch-Partenkirchen. E-Mail: info@kaloyanivanov.de. The responsible entity is the natural or legal person who alone or jointly with others determines the purposes and means of processing personal data (e.g., names, e-mail addresses).

storageDuration.title: Storage Duration
storageDuration.content: Unless a specific storage duration is mentioned in this privacy policy, your personal data will remain with us until the purpose for processing the data no longer applies. If you make a legitimate deletion request or withdraw consent for data processing, your data will be deleted unless we have other legally permissible reasons for storing your personal data (e.g., tax or commercial law retention periods); in the latter case, deletion will occur after these reasons cease to apply.

legalBasis.title: General Information on the Legal Basis for Data Processing on This Website
legalBasis.content: If you have given consent to data processing, we process your personal data on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR or Art. 9 Para. 2 lit. a GDPR, if special categories of data are processed according to Art. 9 Para. 1 GDPR. In the case of explicit consent for the transfer of personal data to third countries, the data processing is also based on Art. 49 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR. If you have consented to the storage of cookies or access to information on your device (e.g., via device fingerprinting), the data processing is additionally based on § 25 Abs. 1 TDDG. Consent can be withdrawn at any time. If your data is necessary for the performance of a contract or for the implementation of pre-contractual measures, we process your data based on Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR. Additionally, we process your data if this is necessary to fulfill a legal obligation based on Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. c GDPR. Data processing may also be based on our legitimate interest according to Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR. Information on the specific legal bases for processing will be provided in the following sections of this privacy policy.

dataRecipients.title: Recipients of Personal Data
dataRecipients.content: In the course of our business activities, we work with various external parties. Sometimes it is necessary to transfer personal data to these external parties. We only pass on personal data to external parties if this is necessary for the performance of a contract, if we are legally obliged to do so (e.g., transfer of data to tax authorities), if we have a legitimate interest in the transfer according to Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR, or if another legal basis permits the transfer. When using processors, we only transfer personal data of our customers based on a valid contract for processing. In the case of joint processing, a joint processing agreement is concluded.

consentWithdrawal.title: Withdrawal of Your Consent to Data Processing
consentWithdrawal.content: Many data processing operations are only possible with your explicit consent. You can withdraw consent you have already given at any time. The legality of the data processing carried out up to the point of withdrawal remains unaffected by the withdrawal.

objectionRights.title: Right to Object to Data Collection in Special Cases and to Direct Advertising (Art. 21 GDPR)
objectionRights.content: IF DATA PROCESSING IS BASED ON ART. 6 PARA. 1 LIT. E OR F GDPR, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO OBJECT AT ANY TIME TO THE PROCESSING OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA ON GROUNDS RELATING TO YOUR PARTICULAR SITUATION; THIS ALSO APPLIES TO PROFILING BASED ON THESE PROVISIONS. THE RELEVANT LEGAL BASIS FOR PROCESSING IS SET OUT IN THIS PRIVACY POLICY. IF YOU OBJECT, WE WILL NO LONGER PROCESS YOUR PERSONAL DATA UNLESS WE CAN DEMONSTRATE COMPELLING LEGITIMATE GROUNDS FOR THE PROCESSING THAT OVERRIDE YOUR INTERESTS, RIGHTS, AND FREEDOMS OR THE PROCESSING IS FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT, EXERCISE, OR DEFENSE OF LEGAL CLAIMS (OBJECTION UNDER ART. 21 PARA. 1 GDPR). IF YOUR PERSONAL DATA IS PROCESSED FOR DIRECT MARKETING PURPOSES, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO OBJECT AT ANY TIME TO THE PROCESSING OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA FOR THE PURPOSE OF SUCH MARKETING; THIS ALSO APPLIES TO PROFILING TO THE EXTENT THAT IT IS RELATED TO SUCH DIRECT MARKETING. IF YOU OBJECT, YOUR PERSONAL DATA WILL NO LONGER BE USED FOR DIRECT MARKETING PURPOSES (OBJECTION UNDER ART. 21 PARA. 2 GDPR).

complaintRight.title: Right to Lodge a Complaint with the Competent Supervisory Authority
complaintRight.content: In the event of violations of the GDPR, affected individuals have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, in particular in the member state of their habitual residence, place of work, or the location of the alleged infringement. The right to lodge a complaint is without prejudice to other administrative or judicial remedies.

dataPortability.title: Right to Data Portability
dataPortability.content: You have the right to have data that we process based on your consent or in the performance of a contract, automatically provided to you or to a third party in a commonly used, machine-readable format. If you request the direct transfer of data to another responsible party, this will only be done if technically feasible.

accessCorrectionDeletion.title: Right to Access, Correction, and Deletion
accessCorrectionDeletion.content: You have the right to request information about your personal data stored by us at any time and free of charge. You also have the right to request the correction of incorrect data or the completion of incomplete data. Furthermore, you have the right to request the deletion of your personal data, provided that this does not conflict with any statutory retention requirements.

restrictionRight.title: Right to Restrict Processing
restrictionRight.content: You have the right to request the restriction of processing your personal data. The restriction means that your data is marked and only processed for certain purposes. You can request the restriction if you dispute the accuracy of your data, if the processing is unlawful but you refuse deletion, if we no longer need the data but you need it for the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims, or if you have objected to processing based on Art. 21 Para. 1 GDPR pending the verification of whether our legitimate grounds override your interests.

sslTlsEncryption.title: SSL or TLS Encryption
sslTlsEncryption.content: This site uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as the inquiries you send to us as the site operator. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the fact that the address line of the browser changes from 'http://' to 'https://' and by the lock symbol in your browser line. If SSL or TLS encryption is activated, the data you transfer to us cannot be read by third parties.

contactForm.title: 4. Contact Form
contactForm.description: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details from the inquiry form, including the contact details you provided there, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions.
contactForm.legalBasis: The data entered in the contact form is processed based on your consent (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR). You can withdraw your consent at any time. The legality of the data processing carried out up to the point of withdrawal remains unaffected by the withdrawal.
contactForm.dataRetention: We will retain the data you provide in the contact form until you request its deletion or until the purpose for processing the data no longer applies (e.g., after processing your inquiry is complete).

googleFonts.title: Google Fonts
googleFonts.description: This website uses Google Fonts for the uniform display of fonts. When you call up a page, your browser loads the required fonts into your browser cache to display texts and fonts correctly.
googleFonts.moreInfo: For more information about Google Fonts, visit the following link:
